Lyric:
[by:Chor_z]
[00:13.28]I used to believe I could be alone 
[00:15.98]I thought I could fly with a heart of stone
[00:18.43]How could I believe what I’ve never known?
[00:22.00]You taught me everything
[00:23.19]
[00:23.63]And even though I tried to be sensible
[00:25.99]I knew that I might either fly or fall
[00:28.80]I was really waiting for a miracle
[00:32.05]You gave me everything
[00:33.02]
[00:33.42]Something that you said turned it all around
[00:36.30]I felt like I was floating above the ground
[00:38.76]Every word you said hanging in the air
[00:42.25]Saw them everywhere
[00:43.34]
[00:43.61]Love is like a highway to paradise
[00:46.34]Like a ray of light that can melt the ice
[00:49.00]Love is everything that we need tonight
[00:51.97]
[00:52.78]Whenever I close my eyes and think of you a storm begins to rise
[00:57.97]All of the memories surround me like a million butterflies
[01:02.96]And if I ever feel I’m falling I just look into your eyes
[01:08.15]And I’m lifted from the darkness by a million butterflies
[01:12.98]
[01:17.72]I used to pretend that I wasn’t cold
[01:19.77]Looking in the dark for a heart of gold
[01:22.18]Waiting for the right story to be told
[01:25.60]To tell me everything
[01:26.68]
[01:27.50]I can hear the words sing a different tune
[01:29.87]Telling me that I’m gonna find you soon
[01:32.37]In a silhouette underneath the moon
[01:36.01]You told me everything
[01:36.76]
[01:37.12]Something that you did turned it all around
[01:40.12]I spread my wings high above the ground
[01:42.64]Every word you said hanging in the air
[01:46.07]Saw them everywhere
[01:47.24]
[01:47.55]Love is like a highway to paradise
[01:50.25]Like a ray of light that can melt the ice
[01:52.84]Love is everything that we need tonight
[01:55.65]
[01:56.76]Whenever I close my eyes and think of you a storm begins to rise
[02:01.79]All of the memories surround me like a million butterflies
[02:06.82]And if I ever feel I’m falling I just look into your eyes
[02:12.35]And I’m lifted from the darkness by a million butterflies
[02:16.84]
[02:28.65]I used to believe I could be alone
[02:31.17]I thought I could fly with a heart of stone
[02:33.65]Now I do believe what I didn’t know
[02:37.23]You taught me everything
[02:38.48]
[02:39.00]Now we’re on the highway to paradise
[02:41.27]You’re the ray of light that can melt the ice
[02:43.94]Love is everything that we need tonight
[02:46.78]
[02:47.68]Whenever I close my eyes and think of you a storm begins to rise
[02:52.96]All of the memories surround me like a million butterflies
[02:57.93]And if I ever feel I’m falling I just look into your eyes
[03:03.10]And I’m lifted from the darkness by a million butterflies
[03:08.02]
[03:08.27]Whenever I close my eyes and think of you a storm begins to rise
[03:13.31]All of the memories surround me like a million butterflies
[03:18.39]And if I ever feel I’m falling I just look into your eyes
[03:23.78]And I’m lifted from the darkness by a million butterflies
